sentences.english: What advice do you have for anyone looking to start a collection of single malts ?
sentences.chinese: 你对那些想开始收藏单麦芽威士忌的人有何建议？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of maltol(MT) on cerebral ischemia and reperfusion damages in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究麦芽醇对大鼠脑缺血再灌注损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: What type of whisky is distilled entirely from malted barley?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的威士忌完全从大麦麦芽中蒸馏而来？

sentences.english: The massecuite thus obtained is then separated into anhydrous crystals of maltitol and mother liquor by conventional separation methods.
sentences.chinese: 结晶糖膏用常规有分离设备分成麦芽糖醇晶体和母液。

sentences.english: and you can eat some of the barley-sugar window, it tastes so nice.
sentences.chinese: 你可以吃一些麦芽糖做的窗户，它尝起来太美味了。

sentences.english: There was kind of alcoholic beverage called li that was made from malted cereals .
sentences.chinese: 有一种酒叫“醴”，是用麦芽谷类制成的。

sentences.english: The enzyme was used during the malting process for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次利用外加酶法辅助麦芽制造。

sentences.english: What type of whisky is distilled entirely from malted barley?
sentences.chinese: 麦芽指的是发芽至开始出现根和茎的大麦。

sentences.english: I got a bottle of my best malt out of the sideboard.
sentences.chinese: 我从餐具柜里取出一瓶自己收藏的最好的麦芽威士忌。

sentences.english: Whiskey is distilled from a fermented mash of grain.
sentences.chinese: 威士忌酒是用蒸馏法从发酵的麦芽浆中提取的。

sentences.english: Stew the chicken for 30 minutes. Remove and brush it with malt sugar.
sentences.chinese: 焖约三十分钟后盛起，于鸡身涂麦芽糖。

sentences.english: Wheat germ provides the B-vitamin biotin, which assists cells in processing fats.
sentences.chinese: 麦芽提供维他命B生物素，帮助细胞加工脂肪。

sentences.english: Fix the chicken on a flat sieve, hang in dry area for 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡肉摊平固定，扫上麦芽糖，在通风处吊干两小时。

sentences.english: It is produced by cultivation of Saccharomyces cerevisiae on malted barley in the production of beer.
sentences.chinese: 它是由种植酿酒酵母的大麦麦芽生产啤酒。

sentences.english: Lastly, stir in maltose and stir well to blend.
sentences.chinese: 最后，加入麦芽糖，翻炒混合均匀。

sentences.english: There are a very marked differences of glucose with maltose.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖和麦芽糖间呈现极显著性差异。

definition: nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
hawthorn tree (rose family, genus Crataegus)/rose hip (hawthorn fruit)
